name: Soccer Beach @Survivor Island
description:
Would you like to compete too many beautiful girls in a fantastic soccer game on a tropical island?
You should absolutely play this beautiful football game enhanced with vivid colors and dynamic game music. Hot sand and beautiful girls will stir you up.

Features:
• 4 different game modes: Hit Target, Free Kick, Arcade, Time Attack
• Realistic physics rules and animations for the goal keeper and players
• Realistic football rules and actions (Dribling, feint and fakes, 360 turning, slide off, jump, shoot and foul)
• Realistic ball action (spinning, chip shot etc.)
• Score table for each game mode
• Competitor wall on free kicks
• Share goal snapshots on Facebook
• Landscape and portrait game modes
